caller_intent: Gloria is seeking to determine if Novum Underwriting can accommodate a workers compensation and umbrella insurance package for a company that sells and leases utility trailers, which she previously attempted to contact Joel about.
resolution_steps: Daniela confirms Joel is no longer with Novum and offers to handle the inquiry.
Gloria explains the account details (trailer sales/leasing in Pilot Mountain) and asks about coverage eligibility.
Daniela requests an email with the account's specifics (e.g., accord form) for review.
Daniela provides her email (daniella.oddawhdb@novumuw.com) and direct phone number (216-505-7009) for follow-up.
Gloria agrees to send an email and update their system with Daniela's contact information.
knowledge_required: Novum Underwriting's underwriting criteria for utility trailer operations
Wholesale insurance program structures and eligibility
Handling of rented equipment in workers compensation/umbrella policies
summary: Gloria inquires about Novum Underwriting's ability to provide workers compensation and umbrella coverage for a trailer leasing business. Daniela, covering Joel's territory, requests detailed account information via email and provides her contact details for follow-up. The call concludes with Gloria agreeing to send an email for review.
